def revs(num):
    r=0
    l = len(str(num))
    while l > 0 :
        r = (r*10)+(num%10)
        num = num / 10
        l-=1
    return r
a =[]
cases = int(raw_input())
while cases > 0:
    a.append(int(raw_input()))
    cases-=1
i = 0
for x in a:

    while x != revs(x):
            x = revs(x) + x
            i+=1
    print i ,x
    i = 0
